title: Trener Robotics raises $32M for robot-agnostic skills platform
description:
Trener Robotics’ Acteris is a robot-agnostic skills platform that lets operators describe the tasks they want to automate in their own words.

The post Trener Robotics raises $32M for robot-agnostic skills platform appeared first on The Robot Report.
